mapper.select: SELECT TBP.ID, TBP.ART_POST_DATE, TBP.USER_ID, TBP.ART_ID, TBA.ART_TITLE, TBA.ART_CATEGORY, TBA.ART_MATERIAL, TBA.ART_SIZE, TBA.ART_DESCRIPTION, TBA.ART_END_DATE, TBA.USER_ID, TBI.ART_IMG_NAME, TBI.ART_IMG_PATH, TBI.ART_ID, TBU.USER_NAME, TBR.REPLY_CONTENT, TBR.REPLY_DATE, TBRL.REPLY_ID, TBRL.USER_ID, TBRL.REPLY_LIKE_TIME FROM TBL_ART_POST TBP JOIN TBL_ART TBA ON TBP.ART_ID = TBA.ID JOIN TBL_ART_IMG TBI ON TBI.ART_ID = TBA.ID JOIN TBL_USER TBU ON TBP.USER_ID = TBU.ID JOIN TBL_REPLY TBR ON TBP.ID = TBR.ART_POST_ID JOIN TBL_REPLY_LIKE TBRL ON TBR.ID = TBRL.REPLY_ID

SELECT TBP.ID, TBP.ART_POST_DATE, TBP.USER_ID, TBP.ART_ID, TBA.ART_TITLE, TBA.ART_CATEGORY, TBA.ART_MATERIAL, TBA.ART_SIZE, TBA.ART_DESCRIPTION, TBA.ART_END_DATE, TBA.USER_ID, TBI.ART_IMG_NAME, TBI.ART_IMG_PATH, TBI.ART_ID, TBU.USER_NAME, TBR.REPLY_CONTENT, TBR.REPLY_DATE, TBRL.REPLY_ID, TBRL.USER_ID, TBRL.REPLY_LIKE_TIME FROM TBL_ART_POST TBP JOIN TBL_ART TBA ON TBP.ART_ID = TBA.ID JOIN TBL_ART_IMG TBI ON TBI.ART_ID = TBA.ID JOIN TBL_USER TBU ON TBP.USER_ID = TBU.ID JOIN TBL_REPLY TBR ON TBP.ID = TBR.ART_POST_ID JOIN TBL_REPLY_LIKE TBRL ON TBR.ID = TBRL.REPLY_ID WHERE TBP.ID = #{id}
